primitiveValues.textValue: I want to register my business with Ndax - AUT

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: I want to register my business with Ndax AUT

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To open a Business Account with Ndax, you will need to do the following:
• Fill out a Ndax Business Account Application form (Must be requested from the support team) • Provide documentation to prove the business's existence (e.g. Business Registration, Certificate of Incorporation, etc.)
Additional documents, such as corporate resolution or additional shareholders' identity verification, may be required based on data from the above two documents. We will be able to let you know further details once we receive them.
